website_summaries.verdict: Thin, light, but ultimately overpriced, the Sony Xperia Z3 Tablet Compact is an elegant, well-equipped Android tablet that's hard to recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely superb!
customer_reviews.text: This is now old technology (2014), but you'd barely know it. Sleek, beautiful and works fast and so well. I was a bit disappointed that it doesn't want to update Kitkat to Marshmallow (its says that it is fully up to date), but Kitkat, despite now being old software, actually does everything you could wish, and its not a big problem. I would have liked to update it if it had let me, however. This is a magic tablet, and I got it particularly to use around the hot-tub, without having to use protective sleeves, etc, so it is just what I wanted. **UPDATE - 5th January 2019** So good, I've bought a second one!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Too many apps installed. Immediately showing that it doesn't have a space left. Too many updates. After last update You Tube app stopped working. Difficult to manage settings. Advantages: - good speakers - great for watching movies - wifi works really well - great for taking pictures - very good for Skype and messenger calls - great battery (lasts for 2-3 days when used daily) If you know how to manage settings and all of the updates then you will be very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great quality compact product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small tablet that fits easily into my shoulder bag, with plenty of extendable memory capacity, great performance and a really good screen for catch-up TV and reading on the commute. This fits my bill perfectly. I've been using it for more than a month and am very satisfied. The battery life is excellent and with a 128GB memory card - I bought- you can load it with plenty of media.
customer_reviews.author: Bristly Badger

customer_reviews.title: I really can't fault it - an excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd bought one of these 2 years ago instead of the Lenovo Tab S8. This Sony has incredible battery life (even though its battery is smaller in capacity than the Lenovo's). Zero battery drain overnight. In fact the Lenovo consumes more battery life standing unused than this Sony does when I'm using it! OK, I'm only a 'light' user, checking emails, a reasonable bit of web browsing and playing scrabble, but no outrageous gaming! It took a while to update itself to Android 6 Marshmallow, going through all the intermediate stages one at a time from KitKat, but it was well worth the wait. I really can't fault it - an excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: MR COLIN BEAL

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12.9 inch iPad pro for use at home and this Sony Xperia compact to use outside. This is a brilliant tablet. One of the best I've used, and I've had an Asus, LG and a couple of iPads. I first bought an Asus Zenpad S 8 inch tablet, but it was very glitchy - the wifi simply stopped responding and I had to do a factory reset, so I sent it back. I decided to have a punt on this Sony tablet and I'm glad I did. It's incredibly thin and light and rock solid in performance. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia Z3 8-inch Tablet Compact
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I've ever owned - premium feel, very light and portable, very comfortable to hold and use (particulary in cramped environments like certain Irish carriers' aeroplanes), exceptionally bright and clear screen, excellent sound (through decent headphones of course), amazing battery life - altogether an astonishing product.
customer_reviews.author: James Towers

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great little tablet. Bought to replace my deceased (bricked) Nexus 7 following an OTA update (thanks Google and Asus) Wanted a small tablet for travelling abroad, weekends away etc but also as a backup when my larger one is on charge. Lovely bright screen. Long battery life. Love the fact that it's waterproof as I sometimes read in the bath. Steam and the chance of getting knocked in to the bath can be a worry, but not so with the Xperia Z3. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet. I went from the Samsung galaxy tab 3 which over time, became slow. This sony is light, perfect size to hold in one hand,a little bigger and it would be too big. Great sound with the twin speakers on the front, barely visible. Really good screen quality, especially when outside. I would highly recommend for a small size but mid range performance tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Bp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for a loved one. I did the reviews first and must admit the quality of the Sony Xperia Z3 is very high. It's supposed to be water proof as well but am sure it will not be tested in the bath. The screen is bright, it refreshes fast and the dual speakers give great sound. It is a good general purpose tablet for those who use their tablets more than their laptops. The images are nice and crisp and it just performs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P

customer_reviews.title: It' a phone as well
customer_reviews.text: which is why I bought it as this combination is hard to find. Tablet itself is as Sony describe, with Android 5.0 Until 'rooted' can only disable pre loaded stuff you might not want, although Sony is less guilty than the others when it comes to pre loading (sorry) 'crap' I bought this to read books on as I did not want the proprietary hardware alternatives. Which works ok with the right software. Need to read indoors though as screen is not optimised for reading by the pool, unlike I understand the proprietary brands.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.  So good I switched to Sony for my phone too
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet that I enjoy using daily. Not the cheapest but very light in the hand, very fast and great visibility. It lasts much longer between charges than my partner's Samsung and I am very happy with my purchase. I don't use most of the Sony apps but they are good enough about it not to be too intrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Walkman451

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Standby time of 1 month without charging. With continuous use (watching videos and reading books) the battery lasts about 8-10 hours. Wifi is very effective and internal storage space is good. I have expanded the external slot (easy to do) to 32 Gb. It is light-weight and yet feels reassuringly solid. Waterproof (with the covers in place) which is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. Kang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet! I had a Nexus 7 before it ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tablet! I had a Nexus 7 before it and I cannot even start listing the differences. Is very fast, thin, light and comfortable for holding. I got it at the beginning of the week, six days later despite daily use, softaware upgrade and app installation the battery is still running (it arrived at 60% and now is about 20%).
customer_reviews.author: H. Niddhog

customer_reviews.title: A great Product! Well done Sony
customer_reviews.text: Amazing is the word for it Pros: 1. Android is smooth on it (have tried both 4.4 and 5) 2. Screen is just the right size to watch videos/tv shows etc. 3. Amazing sound quality with customized surround sound settings and ClearAudio+ 4. Very light weight, feels like you are not holding anything! 5. Battery is good Cons: 1. Camera without a flash. But I don't use camera on tablets so is ok! All in all a great tablet, personally I find it better than those overpriced and superficial Apple tablets.
customer_reviews.author: aviiandevil

customer_reviews.title: great tablet now running android 5 (lollipop)
customer_reviews.text: great tablet now running android 5 (lollipop), just the right size, very powerful and quick with a good screen for watching movies, i sold my galaxy tabpro 10.1 to buy this and i am so pleased with this, the size is better for me and i find the tablet quicker/smoother than the samsung and compared to the wifes ipad mini this a far superior performance wise, fantastic tablet!
customer_reviews.author: S. Benton

customer_reviews.title: Great item, very useful and powerful considering
customer_reviews.text: Great item, very useful and powerful considering, surprisingly good battery life in real world conditions, and the stability of the system is what surprised me most really, bought as a gift for my partner and she loves, and it is an impressive tablet from sony quite simply, it has a rpice tag which is completely justified in comparison with what is on offer.
customer_reviews.author: david w

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully put together piece of technology. Fast and light, and the size is just about perfect. I've purchased it for remote play, which works pretty good, but there's so much more going for it, too. Put it this way, my 1st generation ipad air is playing second fiddle to this gem. Well done Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: premium quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really premium tablet, u can tell straight away that it is a quality product just by the feel of it, and does everything as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: mr michael buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my Samsung galaxy pro 8.4 so far much better then the Samsung tablet, Sony sends regular android updates now running Android 5 where as Samsung running Android 4.4. Works with with my Ps4 which is great for gaming while wife watching her soaps
customer_reviews.author: W. Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Not the toughest screen.Would buy again if they had not added £100 to the cost since last year..
customer_reviews.text: Really Fantastic tablet but shame the screen was not so durable as mine got spider webbed from a 12 inch drop in a case. Why are your screens so breakable yet cost £180 for a new one before labour costs are added?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, very fast switching of applications
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, very fast switching of applications. Only gripe is I read it in the dark, and when the battery's low or changing there's a bright LED, currently using blue tack to block it out. If you keep it above 15% battery though you don't need to worry ! Apart from that it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Basil Fawlty

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this tablet. I can find no flaws with it. It is fast and responsive and the graphics are amazing. It is a perfect size, lightweight and very ultra slim. So easy to use. Very happy I decided to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gothorp

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Android tablets of this size around
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Android tablets of this size around, battery life is brilliant, I get at least a week of use between charges with moderate internet and ebook reading use.
customer_reviews.author: BlokeInUK

customer_reviews.title: Great performance.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Of course it doesn't have the latest top specs, but after a lot of annoyances with the Nexus 9 (being slow etc), I'm much happier with this tablet. Curious if there'll be a Z5 edition soon or not. Only thing the Nexus 9 has over it is the 4:3 screen.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent condition, wouldn't know it was 3rd hand or more. Wrapped it up in a case and tempered glass to keep it that way! Arrived earlier than expected also.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: ... well and is a solid format all functions are easy to set up and use if you are familiar ...
customer_reviews.text: Grand Tablet - works well and is a solid format all functions are easy to set up and use if you are familiar with the Sony layout
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: light, fast, good display, good sound and highly portable
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet, unbelievably light, fastest android device ive used. I love the look of the display a lot more natural than amoled displays. The battery life is also as good as they say it is. Speakers are also very powerful for the size
customer_reviews.author: Elliot W

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Bought from AP-Direct (second hand). In the product description, it mentioned that there were "minor scratches" and to this day I still haven't found any at all! Product came very quickly and the quality was phenomenal. I'm writing this review one year after purchase and it still works incredibly well. I see myself using this tablet for at least another 1.5 years. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ultra lightweight and the screen brightness and colour is fantastic. Happily uploaded all of my settings when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Really fast tablet, ultra lightweight and the screen brightness and colour is fantastic. Happily uploaded all of my settings when I logged in (I have a Sony xperia z1 as a phone) including my wifi passwords, I barely had to set it up. Absolutely fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie A. Chater

customer_reviews.title: great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: great product for great price. one one thing that can be sometimes annoying is that the touch screen is very sensitive but in general the rest is great
customer_reviews.author: mariankiller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Decent tablet. Fast and light. Screen gets finger prints way too easy and built in cameras are crap. No 4k recording unlike the smartphone range with the same name. Magnetic ports more annoying than useful.
customer_reviews.author: Fiendish

customer_reviews.title: Best Andriod on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Received it today, after ages of updates I got to use it properly. Having osteoarthritis of the hands, this is fantastic to hold. It's quick and very responsive. A friend that has a ipad air is very impressed with it. This is day one, if you don't hear anymore from me, then it speaks for it self.. Great tablet. Pete
customer_reviews.author: pete allen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Tablet! perfect size to fit in your hand and is really light weight. I have a Xperia z3 and they both work amazingly well when used side by side. If you use it for a few hours a day you will also find that from fully charged you wont have to charge it for days!
customer_reviews.author: Jason hall-ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tablet! Really snappy even though it doesn't have the latest processer or whatever. That doesn't matter, real world performance is exceptional and the screen ratio for movies etc is perfect! Gorgeous screen too! Incredibly thin and light too which makes you want to use it all day long! If Sony make an updated tablet of the same size and proportions... That's game over! There is none already able to compete with this one! I have owned an ipad mini and this blows it out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Only issue is that it constantly thinks ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Only issue is that it constantly thinks it is in Germany and wont allow a few apps, due to country.????
customer_reviews.author: Brigstock

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light and thin just what you need when ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light and thin just what you need when you are holding it to read etc.very pleased my only niggle is that I can't down load the Barclays bank app as it not excepted on this device.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy use for a pensioner
customer_reviews.text: First tablet and I find it easy to use although in my late 60s. I still have some intuition issues on how to get the best out of the machine but I use it morning noon and night.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need in a useful size tablet
customer_reviews.text: Superb tablet. Everything I need in a useful size tablet. Good battery life and decent screen quality. Shame Sony have withdrawn them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave797

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tablet. I went from the frankly terrible Galaxy Tab S 8.4 LTE that suffered from poor battery life to the Sony, and its like night and day. It's also easy to hold, much lighter and much less laggy than the Samsung. I bought the LTE version.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Holden

customer_reviews.title: its connects to his smart watch and phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother.he is Sony mad.its connects to his smart watch and phone.and he loves it for the picture quality and sound.big memory 10/10
customer_reviews.author: steven radford

customer_reviews.title: best tab.
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing , fast , sleek, very very happy, totally love it , best tablet i have ever had , and had a few, best ever , very quick delivery , exsellent all round ,
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal on a product that is mystifyingly not that available in the UK.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet arrived on time and on good order. It works well and the company whom dispatched it were very efficient. As for the tablet, it was a great deal. The Xperia z3 tablet is quick, easy to use and oh so thin. My wife has been playing with it to compare with here ipad mini and I have to say that I wouldn't swap.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best android tablet by some distance
customer_reviews.text: Best android tablet by some distance. Very slim excellent display and longer than average battery time. What's not to like? Maybe more expensive than some but definitely a quality tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, was sold out everywhere over Christmas but this seller sold it at the best price! I bought this tablet as a gift for my boyfriend but we both use it together and love everything it does. It's fast and moves seamlessly with the android app store there are bundles of apps to enjoy. The camera is also a great addition. The size of the tablet makes it compact and portable :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!. I have the Z3 phone and that is great so no shock.
customer_reviews.author: craig davies

customer_reviews.title: Great if the size suits you
customer_reviews.text: It's a good tablet. Bought on behalf of someone else, they found it smaller than expected so returned
customer_reviews.author: Haz H

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing light and brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing light and brilliant. It camera however needed to be sharper if you are going to rely on it to take pictures
customer_reviews.author: Oracle1

customer_reviews.title: Good but too much bloatware.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased but as many others have said too much bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Just a little issue with Netflix
customer_reviews.text: Only a little issue: some stuttering and crackling when playback stuff downloaded on the Netflix App. no other issue whatsoever reproducing media with VLC or the default app.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviews have mentioned it has so many great advantages. I've personally owned this product for 3 years without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: ... get used to android this appears to be an excellent
customer_reviews.text: once I get used to android this appears to be an excellent tool
customer_reviews.author: webbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality build, screen great clarity, very thin and light. Runs very quickly and with the 3gig of memory it can do multitasking easily. Sony has done a great job with the features and presentation of the software. Extremely happy I chose this and it has added benefit of remote play from PS4 when TV is being used.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wickland

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my Xperia
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Xperia. I've got only one gripe and that is: whenever I move to a room where Wi-Fi is not so good and return then I have to manually connect Wi-Fi in Settings. This never happened with my Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1.
customer_reviews.author: Prawn

customer_reviews.title: I would have been happy, but.
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet until I dropped it, the screen splintered
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Neat and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While still getting used to my tablet so far impressed
customer_reviews.author: macwoody

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design, extremely light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design, extremely light. Great quality of display, pretty good sound as for small tablet. Battery time not very impressive, but it was intensively used to check all possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Radka

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Excellent; never go back to iPads.... Quality, use ability, size and overall satisfaction superb.... Great service too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best in the 8 inch category!
customer_reviews.text: I own the Ipad air. However it became a pain to carry around as i travel a lot. So after extensive research i decided to buy the sony for two reasons; expandable memory and screen quality. Thank god i did not buy the i pad mini. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: medicineman004

customer_reviews.title: Sony at its best.
customer_reviews.text: This for me is quite simply the best all round Tablet on the market,
customer_reviews.author: owdrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good tablet, can't understand why it was discontinued, still offers better performance than many more recent ones
customer_reviews.author: N. Boughton

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet. With android Marshmallow I can say it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet. With android Marshmallow I can say it is ipad mini "killer". For this value you have it's watertightness + phone + sms + all other things what ipad mini can do.. Buy protection glass together.
customer_reviews.author: Jack K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous tablet that feels good in your hand and has performance to match. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilcock

customer_reviews.title: Found the model sony tablet I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped quickly and was the model I was exactly looking for but was having difficulty locating.
customer_reviews.author: denis crocco

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Smooth to use, fast to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Smooth to use, fast to react. The battery life is decent and the included power-saving modes are very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being the greatest electronic mobile device I've ever bought. Waterproof, solid, perfect size, beautiful design. Never once had an issue with this tab. 100% reliable. If Sony could top this, that'd be tremendous.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, super light
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, super light, quick, good battery life just waiting for marshmallow update. I've had Nexus 7, Samsung Pro 10.1 plus ipad, this is my favourite to date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... an average college student can use for education and fun.
customer_reviews.text: It is a durable machine an average college student can use for education and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ibs

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. Very quick delivery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: fantastic device: battery life is extraordinary
customer_reviews.text: fantastic device : battery life is extraordinary , very lightweight , durable. Sony has upgraded the os to 5.1.1 recently.
customer_reviews.author: Liu Fusheng

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: wanted for my phantom 3 advanced drone for first person view,great
customer_reviews.author: david finlayson

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for ps4 remote play only reason i bought it 5G wifi sorry vita you haven't a look in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: - display gets greasy easily. - battery life only 5 hours when active ...
customer_reviews.text: - display gets greasy easily. - battery life only 5 hours when active use. + good quality +fast processor +sharp display
customer_reviews.author: SZILARD SZINCSAK

customer_reviews.title: best 8 inch tablet
customer_reviews.text: Light, compact and fast an amazing tablet you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I use roughly everyday, more than my phone. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: lewis john bate

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Great premium tablet. A little expensive. No issues so far
customer_reviews.author: olweb

customer_reviews.title: Best 8 inch tablet
customer_reviews.text: WOW, i have used Archos Android Tablets, I have used Samsung Android Tablets, I have used the Hudl, I have used iPads, this is by far the best 8 inch tablet available for any money, and i am sure the Z4 when it is released will continue this story. Fast, reliable, easy to use, a little expensive i may hear some of you shout but i cannot believe you will be disappointed, buy one of these if you can, amazing
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: A must buy PS4 companion all round tablet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little tablet, fast, very thin and light... my only gripe goes out to all Android manufacturers not the supplier ..... have a small chip with dedicated memory for the OS so users can get full 16/32gig when we purchase a device
customer_reviews.author: Leachim

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet, really fast, 3GB RAM, reliable, light but sturdy, excellent picture quality, slot for micro sd card expanding memory significantly, average quality of speakers but fantastic quality over headphones, waterproof, simply brilliant battery life, NFC connectivity, fast for graphics heavy games (they do drain the battery faster though as you would expect), you can easily via bluetooth connect with physical keyboard, brilliant for reading books on it (no need to have a kindle and most, if not all, tablets are too heavy to hold in one hand). I would really, highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: D.Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good but but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Bought item to replace nvidia shield tablet. Second choice after looking at all tablets available not as good as nvidia shield but does the job. Good all rounder. Surfing, gaming and many more. Only down fall speed eg processor or lag of.
customer_reviews.author: Papa t

customer_reviews.title: Top Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is truly next generation. So much to offer for such a slim small tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Midgley

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bargains of the year.
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I've ever had, including anything by the fruit company. Sleek, fast, great battery and waterproof so you can Netflix in the bath without any fear.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for a couple years now and I personally love it. One of my favourite tablets Ive owned. Screen is clear and bright enough when in doors just not outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Verma

customer_reviews.title: Not enough storage space but a good tablet otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet but it is only 16 gigabytes and a lot is taken up by the firmware but once Marshmallow is rolled out the memory card might behave properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant slim fast waterproof tablet! Got a 32Gb for 16Gb price on Amazon! :)
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet.. So slim, slick and Fast! Not too much bloatware. Reading in the bath now, no worry about dropping, tho scared to just try submerging it. Have seen it done on Youtube, no probs. Magnetic charger advised so don't wear out waterproofing tabs. I also added a tempered glass protector, feels like its not there!
customer_reviews.author: Hatski

customer_reviews.title: ... that the Sony Xperia Z3 Tablet Compact gets such good reviews, the screen is excellent and responsive
customer_reviews.text: I am not surprised that the Sony Xperia Z3 Tablet Compact gets such good reviews, the screen is excellent and responsive. It is lighter than I thought and so no trouble to carry around all day. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: better then ipad
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet prefer to ipads! Just like the sony phone
customer_reviews.author: C. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Very nice indeed
customer_reviews.text: Great battery (lasting a good 2 days) Easy to use Fantastic value for money You can expand the memory (unlike a certain 'fruit' brand) Decent sound Waterproof as well
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Having played with both I'm so glad I went with the Sony Z3 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between which to go for, the Z3 tablet or the Nexus 9. Having played with both I'm so glad I went with the Sony Z3 Tablet. So light, so fast, an ideal upgrade from me previous Nexus 7. In contrast the Nexus 9 is like the nexus 7 heavy and fat.
customer_reviews.author: I Palmer

customer_reviews.title: This device is very excellent Battery strong Great screen Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This device is very excellent Battery strong Great screen Beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: IBRAHIM N. Ali ALQTAMI

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased, was able to match up with my mobile ...
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased, was able to match up with my mobile phone however not all the emails come through, also the diary entries too,may need to look at set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Walker

customer_reviews.title: she seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother, she seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Yer ma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very slim and attractive tablet. Plenty of oomph but too much Sony bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: GlabrousD

customer_reviews.title: Like Hearthstone? Like this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Tablet arrived today first impressions are very good indeed. I purchased this mainly for a bit of Hearthstone which im happy to say it runs great. It will also be used for the usual iplayer, netflix etc. Only personal gripe i have which is the same for most tablets is that i wish the charging cable was a bit longer. I already have an xperia phone so the OS is second nature but i highly recommed it
customer_reviews.author: Sharpy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it sony xperia z3 tablet New device boxed On time delivered Thank you seller

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter Could not refuse this so returned the super Sony. Maybe later I can rebuy
customer_reviews.text: Had a much more basic tablet bought as a gift by my daughter Could not refuse this so returned the super Sony. Maybe later I can rebuy!
customer_reviews.author: South Tinks

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Love it! By far the best tablet in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Percy Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is fine. Just did not realise the output from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose this tablet mostly based on the sound quality reviews from multiple sources. Not interested in the internal speakers. The sound quality from the headphone jack is quite poor.Just did not realise the output from the headphone jack would be so low. It's too low for my needs. Not good at all for plugging into a sound system really. You have to turn the volume up too high on the sound system to compensate. My old Samsung S3 mini telephone has better sound quality. Waste of money for me. Let down.
customer_reviews.author: andy sp

customer_reviews.title: The tablet works fine however it isn't shock proof and I have managed ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet works fine however it isn't shock proof and I have managed to crack the front glass. Its pretty much impossible to fix yourself and sony are charging £110 to replace. My device was in a case when dropped and still shattered. I recommend you choose a device with a sturdy screen and look at the cases available for the device before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: tegibb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace Samsung tab3, i cannot see any advantages over the Samsung and it is way over priced....disappointed
customer_reviews.author: John Rae should be knighted

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Impressive peace of kit. Had this for a couple of days now, handled all my jobs easily. Forth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dan

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia Z3 Compact 16GB Black
product_meta.description: The Xperia Z3 Tablet Compact redefines portability. It's lighter than a book, as slim as a magazine, and slips easily into a handbag. The most advanced Sony technologies were used to create a compact tablet that's also incredibly powerful. So while it's small on bulk, it's big on performance. Meet a tablet that's not only super light, slim and compact, but waterproof* too. It's equipped to handle rain, spills and days by the pool. Add that it's also dust tight, and you know why we consider it the ultimate
feature_bullets: Waterproof with a rating of IP65/68
4G/LTE feature is available only on SGP621
8" TRILUMINOS Display with Live Colour LED and X-Reality for mobile
PS4 Remote Play on your tablet
A range of apps and accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
